page.title: 10A DAY IN THE LIFE OF JAMES.
page.content: I wake up at 7.0 a.m. I either read or get up. I get dressed, switch off my lamp, open the curtains, then I have breakfast. I put my lunchbox in my rucksack and put my coat on. When Joanna and Stephen come,I go to school. At 9.0 a.m. we start lessons. I do my{ {diary}before Assembly. After, I do either{dictionary work}or{Reading {Laboratory}.Morning play is at 10.40 a.m. After play, we do{Mathematics}. Sometimes I play with a football, a tennis ball or small computer games. At 12.30 p.m. I eat my lunch. At 1.15 p.m. the bell goes. I do either{ {P.E.,Art,Craft or Swimming}.School finishes at 3.30p.m. When I get home I watch television and have my tea.On Monday,I go to{ {St.John's Ambulance Brigade}.I go to bed at 8.30 p.m.
